Package org.vanted.addons.lmme.ui

Class LMMESubsystemViewManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vanted.addons.lmme.ui.LMMESubsystemViewManagement
  • public class LMMESubsystemViewManagement
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the subsystem view during the exploration phase.

    Among others, it is responsible for the resonable combination of selected subsystem graphs to a whole and the addition of further subsystems to an existing drawing.

    Author:
    Michael Aichem

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static LMMESubsystemViewManagement getInstance()

      • showSubsystems

        public void showSubsystems​(java.util.ArrayList<SubsystemGraph> subsystems,
                           boolean clearView,
                           boolean useColor)
        Draws the given subsystems in the subsystems view according to some given options.

        The consolidated subsystem graph is constructed from the given subsystems.

        Parameters:
        subsystems - the list of SubsystemGraphs to be combined into a consolidated subsystem graph
        clearView - whether the subsystems view has to be reset, only showing the selected subsystems. If set to false, the given subsystems will be added to the existing drawing.
        useColor - whether a color mapping shall be used between the overview graph and the subsystems view

      • resetLists

        public void resetLists()
        Resets the list of subsystems to be shown as well as the color mapping.

      • resetOverviewGraphColoring

        public void resetOverviewGraphColoring()
        Resets the colors of the subsystem nodes in the overview graph.
